body:
This information service won't help you contest an eviction or find emergency housing.

 If you are being evicted because you asked for repairs to be done:  

- contact Shelter [https://england.shelter.org.uk/get_help](https://england.shelter.org.uk/get_help)

- or Citizens Advice [https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/renting-privately/ending-your-tenancy/if-youre-being-evicted-because-you-asked-for-repairs/](https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/housing/renting-privately/ending-your-tenancy/if-youre-being-evicted-because-you-asked-for-repairs/)

If you'd like to find out about how to get repairs done in your home, you can continue.
heading: If you are concerned about losing your home
lede: If you have received paperwork from the court or a section 21 notice, your landlord may have started the process of eviction.
